Sentence: The narrative outlines the events surrounding the murder of Santiago Nasar, a young man who is thought to have taken the virginity of Angela Vicario
Angela's twin brothers, Pedro Vicario and Pablo Vicario, ask her (Angela) who took her (Angela) virginity, and she (Angela) tells them that Santiago Nasar did

Pedro and Pablo Vicario were sitting in the local milk-shop, which was en route to the dock, so that they could see Santiago Nasar either going or returning in order to track him (Nasar) down and kill him (Nasar)
After returning home and finding their sister in disgrace, the Vicario brothers set out to avenge her (Vicario) honor by murdering Santiago Nasar
